Kopari Coconut Rose Toner

Brand: Kopari

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA/EAU, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) WATER, POLYSORBATE-20, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, CAPRYLIC?CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, GLYCERIN, PHENOWETHANOL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA [LAVENDER] FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT, COCOS NUCIFERA [COCONUT] FRUIT EXTRACT, ROSE EXTRACT, VANILLA PLANIFDLIA FRUIT EXTRACT,

GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, GLYCERIN, PHENOWETHANOL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA [LAVENDER] FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT, COCOS NUCIFERA [COCONUT] FRUIT EXTRACT, ROSE EXTRACT, VANILLA PLANIFDLIA FRUIT EXTRACT, CYMBOPOGON MARTINI EXTRACT, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA [MATRICARIA] FLOWER [CHAMOMILE] EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, AHNFELTIOPSIS CONCINNA EXTRACT,

VANILLA PLANIFDLIA FRUIT EXTRACT, CYMBOPOGON MARTINI EXTRACT, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA [MATRICARIA] FLOWER [CHAMOMILE] EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, AHNFELTIOPSIS CONCINNA EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
